akn:section.akn:heading: System of Mental Health Care Sub-Council.

akn:content.akn:p: In conformity with Mayor’s Order 99-60, effective March 16, 1999, the Director shall convene a System of Mental Health Care Sub-Council of the District’s Intragovernmental Youth Investment Collaborative, for the purpose of developing a system of care for children, youth, and their families. This Sub-Council shall continue to exist in the event that Mayor’s Order 99-60 is repealed.
The Sub-Council shall consist of the following individuals:
